title_en: 1931 Willie Haney Letters, Pt. 2 [The Rabbit and the Wolf]
comment: "The wolf act like he is dead and the rabbit went and got many turkeys to dance on when danced on the wolf jumped up and eaten cXXX"

sentences.full_text: Chokfot opahoshon eshtoklak yawkaktawa.
Opahoshot chokfon epahommen chokfot onkakat," Chalechechkaten empekoka anot chenhechlechelalesh awelushekan fitot oherahtowa.
Mon olokenchon-tohkalen ashfek empechkalakash."

kachen opahoshoka chokfe elechetek honchek man omeka fitoka olokachon-tohkechkahen okshechek empalalesh mameshka[ page 9] maaten ommeka chehnon chelechek echenolelalesh" opahoshoka chokfon kaachen| chokfot onkakat" man ommeka arak fitoka ossontahom-melesh.
Elepahchomek talakechkan fitoka osselalesh.

original.original_gloss: you act like you a dead

sentences.full_text: Mamehkok anot enhopanalen fitoka echontalwalakash.
Mamen shonapah-oran ommek, lok-tolopkak[ page 10] fitoka ashfechkalakash."
kachen, opahoshoka" afachk-herot mahmelakash" kachen chokfoka arak ayyakan fitoka yawlechen eshechak chokfoka fiton enholashek opahoshot echokshehochek echempak omhahmekwa.
Yameka opahoshoka elepahchot talaaken eshechommelesh.
Mate lapkot[ page 11] achachakarachachkan arachohen ma opahoshe elehtalankakan oshrachon ontalwak onafachkech?
mot echokshehochek echenolek omhahmekwa, yaameka elepahchot talakommesh.
mate, yamekhok, onafachkech?
chofoka fiton kachen," man ommeka, hanton talakommen ommeka[ page 12] sheporechkan opahoshon onafachkahekash."
fitoka kachehen," chokfot emokaten fitoka achonkot achakarachen, la wilek ossontek Opaahosh talakakan osselakan opahooshoka elepahchommek talakan fitoka hechak lapkot ontalwak onafachkoch."
fitoka etekachek ontalwahen, chokfot[ page 13] onkakat," anot chenhopaahonaalen ontalwachkalakash."
kachek, chokfoka hopanak onkakat," yos-keteshchache-kan afesh yos- keteshchachekan afesh."
enkak hopanan, fitot onkakat," matehchon entaron hopanok-kesh.
Ma hopankoka heratek ommesh," fitoka[ page 14] chokfon kachen," mot herot ommesh."
Ma hopankot kachechhok, opahoshoka lok tolopkan fitoka ayamalen yakashlechekak, mamen opahoshoka ramen afan chokfoka renekak washakepaktawa.
Hokahlash.
